OOC: I accepted you killing him but I have other uses for him.

::Enertron::
    He was still alive but his body was useless.  He would have to find 
someone capable of handling his ability.  They could keep his body.  He had 
no use for it anymore.  The fool slit his throat.  That had served no 
purpose, the body was dead.  The spark however remained.  It was protected by 
the energy that was used as a weapon of the body.  The body arched as the 
spark was flung out at the ceiling.  It quickly left through the still open 
door that Galvatron had come in.  The spark, contained by its innate ability 
to control energy, flew into the distance faster than even Galvatron could 
match.
